## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G26110](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G26110)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATNAP1;1, NAP1;1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA NUCLEOSOME ASSEMLY PROTEIN 1;1, nucleosome assembly protein1;1
- **Description:**   nucleosome assembly protein1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2120785
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
